mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookshelf(bookshelfno, m_no, p_name, p_infor, file1, thumb1, size1) VALUES(bookshelf_seq.nextval, #{m_no}, #{p_name}, #{p_infor}, #{file1}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT bookshelfno, m_no, p_name, p_infor, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM bookshelf ORDER BY bookshelfno asc
